titles.title: HP387 Your light, O God, was given to earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your light, O God, was given to earth,
The light of truth, your wisdom's flame;
From age to age it grew more clear,
And glorious shone when Jesus came.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines:
Forgive us, Lord, if we have spurned
Your truth, your light, your wisdom's way;
And lead our hearts through Christ to find
In love the road to perfect day.
